# simd_short1

**Type Alias**

A vector of one 16-bit signed integer element.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias simd_short1 = Int16
```

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_short2**: A vector of two 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short3**: A vector of three 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short4**: A vector of four 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short8**: A vector of eight 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short16**: A vector of sixteen 16-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_short32**: A vector of thirty-two 16-bit signed integer elements.
